title: The silicone-free hair products that promise to transform your hair
text:
I’m constantly on the hunt for great hair products that don’t contain silicones, especially this time of year, when post holiday follicles need a big, juicy, shine-impacting boost. According to hairdresser Michael Van Clark (always trust a hairdresser: they see so much actual hair) silicones ultimately dry out hair. Of course they’re not great for the environment either, since the heavier ones don’t easily break down.

Not everyone agrees that light silicones are a problem, as they provide “product slippage” (meaning your hair is more slippery so it’s easier to run your fingers through it). But interestingly, mass brands such as Herbal Essences now offer competitively priced silicone-free shampoos...
